meanings.definition: To clean with a vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent1: She vacuumed the carpet in the living room.
meanings.sent2: I vacuumed the floor before the guests arrived.
meanings.sent3: The cat vacuumed up all the spilled catnip.
meanings.sent4: The vacuumed room felt fresh and tidy.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the vacuumed carpet was soothing.

meanings.definition: Having been cleaned with a vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent2: The vacuumed car interior smelled fresh.
meanings.sent3: The vacuumed couch was surprisingly fluffy.
meanings.sent4: Her vacuumed room was a sanctuary of cleanliness.
meanings.sent5: The vacuumed floors gleamed under the sunlight.
